mapper.select: {CALL sp_chatting_room_cud( #{operation, mode=IN, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{id, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buyerId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sellerId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{chattingStatus, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultMessage, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{affectedRows, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{generatedId, mode=OUT, jdbcType=BIGINT} )}
SELECT chatting_room_id AS id, product_id, buyer_id, seller_id, chatting_status, created_at, updated_at FROM v_chatting_room_list WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT product_name, product_id, chatting_room_id, seller_id, seller_nickname, created_at as last_chatting_time FROM v_chatting_room_list WHERE buyer_id = #{authId} OR seller_id = #{authId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
